oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Larry Nichols interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nichols, Larry; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Larry Nichols served in-country from June 1966 to June 1968, and was a cavalry platoon leader.
